about_the_game:
Lipsync Killers is a rhythm and RPG game inspired by 2D fighting games. Choose your drag queen and perform the best lipsyncs, showing off your moves and using charged and super special attacks to knock your opponent down! And that's not all! Besides challenging other queens in fast and electrifying matches, complete daily missions to collect prizes and other items to make the competition even more exciting.

GAMEPLAY

With simple commands that require your attention, precision, and rhythm, you need to do your best to perform as many combos as possible. Watch out for the "Lip Drop," which will challenge you in a direct showdown with your opponent. Need some help? Use your special attacks to avoid mistakes and earn extra points. Feeling a little bit lost? Use your super special to increase your score multiplier and turn the match in your favor.

COLOR VARIATIONS

And to truly shine, your drag queen needs to look fabulous! Before starting the battle check out the color variations of the outfits and choose your favorite on the character selection screen. Additionally, skins with unique special attacks for each character will be available to bring even more personality to your drag.

EXPLORE STAGES

Dive into different and colorful environments inspired by pop culture and the drag universe. All stages feature original settings with many Easter eggs, memes and well-known personalities in the pop world. You've got to be smart to catch it all, because we all know that "beauty fades, and dumb is forever".

MISSION SYSTEM

Coins, diamonds, makeup, hot glue, and stickers. These and other items can be collected in daily and career missions that will challenge you during the matches. And there's more! The missions can be even more rewarding during special events.

MINI GAMES

We know that drag queens do so much more than just lipsyncing. So, how about trying a mini hair-flipping game? Or balancing plenty of wigs on your head? And if you're really brave, I dare you to do a split right in front of a police car. Do you think it's easy being a drag queen?

POWER-UPS

With your coins you can improve attributes, using makeup kits, high heels, hot glue, and glitter. And if you want to challenge yourself, collect more coins, achieve a higher score or get some help during the matches, you can use stickers and have a special boost during the game

REVEAL TEA

And that's not all! With diamonds you can collect items to improve your performance in the match, as well as getting new characters, special colors and, of course, skins. A drag game without a bunch of outfits to change wouldn't be a drag game, right?!

name: Lipsync Killers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle with Drag Queens and Kings in this rhythm game inspired by 2D fighting games. Charge special moves, complete daily missions, collect prizes, use power-ups to enhance your attributes, collect skins with incredible visuals and exclusive moves, all in fast and exciting matches.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
